<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Arg Node Formatting

Represents a positional required block/method argument.

`a` in `def m(a); end` or `proc { |a| }`

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Works

Before:

```ruby
def foo(v)
  nil
end
```

After:

```ruby
def foo(v)
  nil
end
```

## Formats a procarg

Before:

```ruby
proc { |e| }
```

After:

```ruby
proc { |e|}
```
